item.description:
Come see me (Jodi) perform at Cask 'N Flagon....it's one of the best events of the night! You won't want to miss this!

Ask the hostess to direct you to the Jodi/meet-up (Social Fun and Happy Hour) seats.

Come early at 7PM and enjoy appetizers at Cask 'N Flagon (http://www.casknflago...) and then I'll (Jodi) be performing at 8PM at Oliver's ( http://www.casknflago... ), inside Cask 'N Flagon.

I'll (Jodi) be performing with my band at this gig, which really makes the music standout, giving the show a whole other dimension. I think you will really enjoy my music. The other bands that are performing are Central Ave at 9PM and Fenderline at 11PM.

There is a $9 cover charge.
Cask 'N Flagon is less than a ten minute walk from the Kenmore subway station on the Green Line. There is also a parking lot on Brookline Ave, less than a block away but don't know cost.

Feel free to check out my music on my website at http://www.jodigriffi... I play pop, rock, and alternative originals and I write most of my songs. My music is about having a positive outlook on life. I try to write with the intent of helping people from all walks of life get past their fears and accomplish satisfaction in their lives. If I can reach people through my music, I believe I am helping my fans one by one.

http://www.myspace.co...
http://www.facebook.c...
http://twitter.com/jo...
http://www.itunes.com....

Peace!
Jodi
item.how_to_find_us: Ask the hostess to direct you to the Jodi/meet-up (Social Fun and Happy Hour) seats.
item.name: Appetizers, Drinks, & Music at Cask 'N Flagon Thursday March 25th
